record.description: Waves Lt. (j.g.) Mary Elizabeth Grenander of Chicago, former University of Chicago fencing champion, now stationed at the U.S. Naval Training School (WR) Bronx, N.Y., won another title recently. She was awarded the U.S. Service Man's Medal in the 50-meter metallic sight rifle match held at the Columbia Rifle Club of Patterson, New Jersey.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached. Navy: Women Accepted for Voluntary Emergency Service
